Name: markcassar
AboutMe:
An advanced interactive HTML 5 & Flash developer, web designer & developer from Malta having great passion for interactive design & development. Having more than 10 years experience in interactive development, Flash & web development, I can deliver rich interactive solutions using both HTML5 & Flash. Currently holding the position of Creative Director at CasaSoft Ltd..

Using the latest technology available, I'm challenged to push the boundaries in new media with a vision of enhancing the overall level of web in Malta and also engage with foreign international clients.

The main core aspect that I value in design and interactive applications is simply quality.
